    • 构造器详细资料

      • DeviceBluetoothManager

        public DeviceBluetoothManager()

    • 方法详细资料

      • addBluetoothDevicesToBlackList

        public boolean addBluetoothDevicesToBlackList(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                              java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> devices)
        Called by an application that is administering the device set the Bluetooth device to blacklist. After set this, Bluetooth Service will check the Bluetooth device restriction, disconnect if need.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        devices - Bluetooth device to be added to blacklist
        返回:
        boolean. true if restricted Bluetooth devices has been set successfully.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_BLUETOOTH} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • addBluetoothDevicesToWhiteList

        public boolean addBluetoothDevicesToWhiteList(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                              java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> devices)
        Called by an application that is administering the device set the Bluetooth device to whitelist. After set this, Bluetooth Service will check the Bluetooth device restriction, disconnect if need.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        devices - Bluetooth device to be added to whitelist
        返回:
        boolean. true if restricted Bluetooth devices has been set successfully.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_BLUETOOTH} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • removeBluetoothDevicesFromBlackList

        public boolean removeBluetoothDevicesFromBlackList(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                                   java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> devices)
        Called by an application that is administering the device remove the Bluetooth device from blacklist. After set this, Bluetooth Service will check the Bluetooth device restriction, disconnect if need.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        devices - Bluetooth device to be removed from blacklist
        返回:
        boolean. true if restricted Bluetooth devices has been removed successfully.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_BLUETOOTH} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • removeBluetoothDevicesFromWhiteList

        public boolean removeBluetoothDevicesFromWhiteList(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                                   java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> devices)
        Called by an application that is administering the device remove the Bluetooth device from whitelist. After set this, Bluetooth Service will check the Bluetooth device restriction, disconnect if need.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        devices - Bluetooth device to be removed from whitelist
        返回:
        boolean. true if restricted Bluetooth devices has been removed successfully.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_BLUETOOTH} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • getBluetoothDevicesFromBlackLists

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getBluetoothDevicesFromBlackLists(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Get the the list of blacklisted Bluetooth devices
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        返回:
        ArrayList. the list of blacklisted Bluetooth devices
        抛出:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_BLUETOOTH} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • getBluetoothDevicesFromWhiteLists

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getBluetoothDevicesFromWhiteLists(android.content.ComponentName admin)

        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        返回:
        ArrayList. the list of whitelisted Bluetooth devices
        抛出:

      • isBlackListedDevice

        public boolean isBlackListedDevice(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                   java.lang.String device)
        Check if the device is blacklisted Bluetooth devices
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with. null means global
        device - Which to be checked
        返回:
        true if the device in blacklist
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_BLUETOOTH} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • isWhiteListedDevice

        device - Which to be checked
        返回:

        抛出:

      • setDiscoverableDisabled

        public boolean setDiscoverableDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                       boolean disable)
        enable or disable Bluetooth discoverable mode.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        disable - true to disable,false to enable
        返回:
        boolean. true if state set success,else false.
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_BLUETOOTH} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • isDiscoverableDisabled

        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        返回:
        boolean. true if disable successful,else false.
        抛出:

        enable or disable limited discoverable mode.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        disable - true to disable,false to disable

        抛出:
